Type.Name: MissingMethodException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MissingMethodException extends System.MissingMemberException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when there is an attempt to dynamically access a method that does not exist.

remarks.para:
Normally a compilation error is generated if code attempts to access a nonexistent method of a class. is designed to handle cases where an attempt is made to dynamically access a renamed or deleted method of an assembly that is not referenced by its strong name. The
is thrown when code in a dependent assembly attempts to access a missing method in an assembly that was modified.

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempted to access a missing method." This message takes into account the current system culture.
The property of the new instance is initialized to .

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
